entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who has been injured and is seeking treatment.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A person who works in an office that Harry visits, causing him harm.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is waiting for him in the common room.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is sympathetic and helpful.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: A cat that belongs to Hermione and provides comfort to Harry.

relationships.description: Harry was injured by Umbridge in her office.
Hermione helped Harry treat his injury with a solution of pickled murtlap tentacles.
Ron was waiting for Harry in the common room when he returned.
Crookshanks provided comfort to Harry by curling around his legs and purring loudly.
